Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 103rd overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1973...
Had first career hit on 5/30/1977, off John Erickson (TOL)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/24/1981, off Andres Echeverria (MAN)...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/9/1984 to a 2-year deal worth $414,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/24/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $561,000 per year...
Injured on 5/13/1986 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to New Jersey on 2/1/1987 (Going to SHP: C B. Ingalls, P E. Wilbanks. Going to NJ: CF M. Carrion)...
Injured on 7/5/1987 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
